page.title: 16School Day at Stifford Clays
page.content: Our school is a Junior School on the Stifford Clays estate. 8.45am.I buy my dinner ticket,then meet my friends in our classroom. 9.10am.Register then assembly.We saw the first part of 'Treasures in the Snow'-can't wait for part two. 9.40am.Maths-my favourite subject. After we are told to write about a typical day.I enjoyed that-lunch bell. 1.15pm.Break over and back to our classes for 'quiet reading'.Time ticked away until 'story time'.We are listening to 'I am David' everyone's enjoying it.For the last few minutes we had a General Knowledge quiz.We bring in the questions, then it's boys against girls.The boys are winning at the moment. 3.15pm.The end of an enjoyable school day. Louise Stitt.
